SELECT id,userid,approval_username,investors_type,description,company,company_duties,work_card,approval_result, supplementary_explanation,review_time,create_time,leadership,form_id,institution_id FROM investors_approval WHERE 1=1
AND (approval_username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{checkName},'%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{checkName},'%') OR company LIKE CONCAT('%',#{checkName},'%') OR company_duties LIKE CONCAT('%',#{checkName},'%') )
AND to_days(create_time) = to_days(now())
AND YEARWEEK(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m')
ORDER BY create_time desc LIMIT #{beginNum},#{pageSize}
